title: Blouse
description: yellow dominates multicolored embroidery; satin stitch, chain stitch, outlined mirrors--large and small; long sleeves; waist ties; yellow fabric, green lining; diamond shapes dominate embroidery; V-neck; neck ties; also print lining at back edges; body shape
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
